name: Trashy's Scrapbook
description:
A Sentient Trash Can comes to life! All you need to not get spooked!

Don't Trust Trashy

In Trashy's Scrapbook you explore around a neighborhood with the goal of searching the trash for a bar of chocolate.

Explore the neighborhood and try to avoid Mr. Trashy.

Created by Xfininator (Made in 3 Days)
